column2: Hey there, I hear you're pretty good with Fizzics. Want to try one of my puzzles?

I'm Faber. I've heard of you but I haven't had a chance to say hi yet. Nice to meet you!

I hear you're quite the Fizzics pro. Let's see if you can resolve this puzzle I just put together.

Go ahead and launch Fizzics.
Here's your challenge: Make it so all 10 of these green balls are touching the red spiky ball at the same time.
Clearly you'll need to hack into Fizzics to do this.
Look at the attraction and repulsion forces.
What if you make the green balls smaller?
That's what I'm talking about! Way to go! Riley was right about you.
Hey Faber, since we're here, any idea what this item I found earlier might be?

Hmmm, not sure. It reminds me of another one I saw somewhere. Let me see.

Oh here it is! Look, it looks very similar to yours. Here, take it, Riley.

Thanks Faber!

Hold up! Not only is this very similar to the one we have, they actually fit together!

It looks like a key! Do you think it might let us deeper into the System? We def need to check this out later.
